description: Action films feature high-energy scenes, fights, and thrilling adventures.
Adventure films tell stories of exploration, journeys, and dangerous quests.
Comedy films offer humorous stories designed to make audiences laugh and entertain.
Drama films explore serious themes in depth and evoke emotional responses.
Horror films are designed to frighten and create suspense.
Sci-fi films explore futuristic technology, space travel, and scientific concepts.
Romance films focus on love stories and emotional relationships.
Thriller films deliver suspenseful, tension-filled moments.
Fantasy films include magic, mythical creatures, and imaginary worlds.
Animation films present hand-drawn or computer-generated characters and worlds.
Documentary films examine real-life events, people, or topics.
Musical films integrate songs and dances as part of the storytelling.
Mystery films revolve around unsolved puzzles and enigmatic events.
Historical films depict events, figures, or settings from the past.
